dictionary.name: Committee Name
dictionary.definition: Name of committee to which contribution was made. Name associated with committee SBOE-ID.
dictionary.source: Reported by committee to NC State Board of Elections in Field 1 Committee Full Name (and Fund if applicable) of Form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals, CRO 1220 Contributions from Political Party Committees, or CRO 1230 Contributions from Other Political Committees.

dictionary.name: Date Ocurred
dictionary.definition: Date on which the contribution was received by the committee
dictionary.source: NC State Board of Elections Form CRO 1210 Contributions from Individuals field j Date, CRO 1220 Contributions from Political Party Committees field g Date, or CRO 1230 Contributions from Other Political Committees field i Date OR Date entered on Receipt Information screen of Remote Filing Software.

dictionary.name: Amount
dictionary.source: North Carolina State Board of Elections form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals field k

dictionary.name: Form of Payment
dictionary.definition: Financial instrument used to make the contribution.
dictionary.source: NC State Board of Elections form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals field h Form of Payment, CRO 1220 Contributions from Political Party Committees field e Form of Payment Code, or CRO 1230 Contributions from Other Political Committees field g Form of Payment OR Form of Payment entered on Receipt Information screen of Remote Filing Software.

dictionary.name: Comment
dictionary.definition: Purpose of expenditure or comment made about contribution or other transaction.
dictionary.source: NC State Board of Elections. Source is unclear, possibly form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals field d Comments, CRO 1220 Contributions from Political Party.  Committees field b Comments, or CRO 1230 Contributions from Other Political Committees field d Comments

dictionary.name: Contributor Type
dictionary.definition: Type of entity making the contribution.
